testimonials.quote1: Lauro is a super proactive professional, always seeking better solutions and automations to help everyone. During his time at NavSupply it was a pleasure to have him on the team!
testimonials.quote2: Extremely competent professional and attentive. The ease with which he handles complex animations and performance is what sets him apart in the frontend development market.
testimonials.quote3: If you are looking to transform concepts into fluid digital experiences, he is the right person. The code is clean, modern, and very well structured.
testimonials.quote4: Excellent developer. Delivered the project ahead of schedule and with a visual quality that exceeded our initial expectations. Has facility working in a team and being self-taught is a differential in him.
testimonials.undertitle4: Civil Engineer | CEO at RG Forte Construtora
testimonials.quote5: Lauro doesn't just develop, he understands the product. His proactive communication and flexibility with time zones were key to the success of our launch. I highly recommend his services!

experiences.card1Desc: I helped in the development of an e-commerce platform using Next.js, improving interactivity between foreign cruise ship buyers and the sales team, as well as providing specialized technical (IT) support to the internal team.
experiences.card2Desc: Designed and developed mobile app for both iOS & Android platforms using React Native.
experiences.card3Desc: I led the dev of a full-stack mobile app for a client, from initial concept to deployment, using Next.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB with API consumption, like Uploadthing.
experiences.card4Desc: Developed and maintained user-facing features using modern frontend technologies.

approach.card1Desc: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.
approach.card2Desc: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.
approach.card3Desc: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved designs, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.
